creator_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the task.

owner_id.description: Unique identifier of the user the task is assigned to.

resource_type.description: Name of the resource type the task is attached to.  Possible values:  lead  contact  deal

resource_id.description: Unique identifier of the resource the task is attached to.

completed.description: Indicator of whether the task is completed or not.

completed_at.description: Date and time of the task's completion in UTC (ISO8601 format).

overdue.description: Indicator for whether the task has passed the due_date or not.

remind_at.description: Date and time that we should send you a reminder

created_at.description: Date and time of task creation.

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update to the task.
